text: Júlio Pomar, GOL, GCM (January 10, 1926 - May 22, 2018) was a Portuguese painter. He was born in Lisbon. Pomar worked in the neo-realist movement from 1945-1957 and later became a neo-expressionist. He illustrated a children's book by American-Portuguese novelist Richard Zimler. Pomar died at the age of 92 at a hospital in Lisbon on May 22, 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== *Júlio Pomar at the Modern Art Center (In Portuguese) Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Portuguese painters Category:Illustrators Category:Artists from Lisbon
